languages.text: {n}Префект вздыхает.{/n} "Грегорас, вы прекрасно знаете, что сейчас любой человек на счету. Ваш контингент крайне мал, и уменьшается год от года. Регламенты Адептус Администратум дозволяют использовать наемную рабочую силу". {n}Несмотря на грозный вид маршала, префект отвечает на его взгляд своим, прямым и спокойным.{/n}

{n}Vultur sighs.{/n} "Gregoras, you know we need every fighter we can get these days. You have precious few people at your disposal, and every year, fewer still remain. The Adeptus Administratum regulations do not prohibit the employment of hired force." {n}She meets the Marshal's fierce gaze with calm composure.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Префект вздыхает.{/n} "Грегорас, вы прекрасно знаете, что сейчас любой человек на счету. Ваш контингент крайне мал, и уменьшается год от года. Регламенты Адептус Администратум дозволяют использовать наемную рабочую силу". {n}Несмотря на грозный вид маршала, префект отвечает на его взгляд своим, прямым и спокойным.{/n}

The Adeptus Administratum regulations do not prohibit the employment of hired force." {n}She meets the Marshal's fierce gaze with calm composure.{/n}

The Adeptus Administratum regulations do not prohibit the employment of hired force." {n}She meets the Marshal's fierce gaze with calm composure.{/n}

{n}Vultur sighs.{/n} "Gregoras, you know we need every fighter we can get these days. You have precious few people at your disposal, and every year, fewer still remain. The Adeptus Administratum regulations do not prohibit the employment of hired force." {n}She meets the Marshal's fierce gaze with calm composure.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ヴァルターはため息をついた。{/n}「グレゴラス、今は一人でも多くの戦力が必要なのはわかっているでしょう？あなたの手元に残された人員はごくわずかで、年々さらに減っています。帝国行政局の規定では、傭兵の雇用は禁止されていません」{n}彼女は将帥の鋭い視線を、落ち着いた態度で受け止めた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Vultur sighs.{/n} "Gregoras, you know we need every fighter we can get these days. You have precious few people at your disposal, and every year, fewer still remain. The Adeptus Administratum regulations do not prohibit the employment of hired force." {n}She meets the Marshal's fierce gaze with calm composure.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ヴァルターはため息をついた。{/n}「グレゴラス、今は一人でも多くの戦力が必要なのはわかっているでしょう？あなたの手元に残された人員はごくわずかで、年々さらに減っています。帝国行政局の規定では、傭兵の雇用は禁止されていません」{n}彼女は将帥の鋭い視線を、落ち着いた態度で受け止めた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vultur seufzt.{/n} "Gregoras, Ihr wisst doch, dass wir dieser Tage jeden Kämpfer brauchen, den wir bekommen können. Euch stehen bemerkenswert wenige Leute zur Verfügung, und jedes Jahr sinkt ihre Zahl weiter. Die Regularien des Adeptus Administratum sprechen sich nicht gegen die Rekrutierung von Söldnern aus." {n}Sie begegnet dem grimmigen Blick des Marschalls mit ruhiger Gelassenheit.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Vultur sighs.{/n} "Gregoras, you know we need every fighter we can get these days. You have precious few people at your disposal, and every year, fewer still remain. The Adeptus Administratum regulations do not prohibit the employment of hired force." {n}She meets the Marshal's fierce gaze with calm composure.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vultur seufzt.{/n} "Gregoras, Ihr wisst doch, dass wir dieser Tage jeden Kämpfer brauchen, den wir bekommen können. Euch stehen bemerkenswert wenige Leute zur Verfügung, und jedes Jahr sinkt ihre Zahl weiter. Die Regularien des Adeptus Administratum sprechen sich nicht gegen die Rekrutierung von Söldnern aus." {n}Sie begegnet dem grimmigen Blick des Marschalls mit ruhiger Gelassenheit.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vultur soupire.{/n} « Gregoras, vous savez bien que nous avons besoin de combattants, quels qu'ils soient. Vos effectifs sont limités et s'amenuisent chaque année. Les règles de l'Adeptus Administratum ne vous interdisent pas de faire appel à des mercenaires si le besoin s'en fait sentir. » {n}Elle soutient calmement le regard féroce du maréchal.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Vultur sighs.{/n} "Gregoras, you know we need every fighter we can get these days. You have precious few people at your disposal, and every year, fewer still remain. The Adeptus Administratum regulations do not prohibit the employment of hired force." {n}She meets the Marshal's fierce gaze with calm composure.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vultur soupire.{/n} « Gregoras, vous savez bien que nous avons besoin de combattants, quels qu'ils soient. Vos effectifs sont limités et s'amenuisent chaque année. Les règles de l'Adeptus Administratum ne vous interdisent pas de faire appel à des mercenaires si le besoin s'en fait sentir. » {n}Elle soutient calmement le regard féroce du maréchal.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vultur suspira.{/n} «Gregoras, sabe que necesitamos a todos los guerreros que podamos obtener estos días. Le queda muy poca gente, y la cifra baja cada año. Las regulaciones del Adeptus Administratum no prohíben la contratación de personal externo». {n}Responde a la feroz mirada del Mariscal con calma y compostura.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Vultur sighs.{/n} "Gregoras, you know we need every fighter we can get these days. You have precious few people at your disposal, and every year, fewer still remain. The Adeptus Administratum regulations do not prohibit the employment of hired force." {n}She meets the Marshal's fierce gaze with calm composure.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vultur suspira.{/n} «Gregoras, sabe que necesitamos a todos los guerreros que podamos obtener estos días. Le queda muy poca gente, y la cifra baja cada año. Las regulaciones del Adeptus Administratum no prohíben la contratación de personal externo». {n}Responde a la feroz mirada del Mariscal con calma y compostura.{/n}

languages.text: {n}沃尔图尔行政官叹了口气。{/n}“格雷戈拉斯，这种时候，我们能争取到的每位战士，都必须争取过来。你手底下的人本来就不够用，这些年还越来越少。帝国内政部的规定里，并没有‘禁止雇佣外部成员’这项内容。”{n}她迎着元帅怒气冲冲的目光，镇定自若。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Vultur sighs.{/n} "Gregoras, you know we need every fighter we can get these days. You have precious few people at your disposal, and every year, fewer still remain. The Adeptus Administratum regulations do not prohibit the employment of hired force." {n}She meets the Marshal's fierce gaze with calm composure.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}沃尔图尔行政官叹了口气。{/n}“格雷戈拉斯，这种时候，我们能争取到的每位战士，都必须争取过来。你手底下的人本来就不够用，这些年还越来越少。帝国内政部的规定里，并没有‘禁止雇佣外部成员’这项内容。”{n}她迎着元帅怒气冲冲的目光，镇定自若。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vultur iç çekiyor.{/n} "Gregoras, bugünlerde bulabileceğimiz her savaşçıya ihtiyacımız olduğunu biliyorsun. Emir altında çok az değerli kimse var, üstelik her yıl sayıları daha da azalıyor. Adeptus Administratum yönetmelikleri, kiralık kuvvet istihdamını yasaklamıyor." {n}Miralay'ın sert bakışlarına sakin bir tavırla karşılık veriyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Vultur sighs.{/n} "Gregoras, you know we need every fighter we can get these days. You have precious few people at your disposal, and every year, fewer still remain. The Adeptus Administratum regulations do not prohibit the employment of hired force." {n}She meets the Marshal's fierce gaze with calm composure.{/n}
